mapper.sql: sm.material_id, sm.material_code, sm.material_name, sm.material_desc, sm.unit, sm.version, sm.product_model_id, sm.material_type, sm.material_source, sm.barcode_rule_id, sm.if_compoboard, sm.if_linking_board, sm.linking_board_number, sm.takt, sm.transfer_quantity, sm.`status`, sm.organization_id, sm.remark, sm.customer_material_code, sm.min_package_number, sm.create_user_id, sm.create_time, sm.modified_user_id, sm.modified_time, sm.is_delete, sm.option1, sm.option2, sm.option3
mapper.select:
select, su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, spm.product_model_code, bpf.product_family_code, bpf.product_family_name, bpf.product_family_desc, bo.organization_name from fantech_imes.smt_material sm left join ocean.sys_user su on sm.create_user_id=su.user_id left join ocean.sys_user sus on sm.modified_user_id=sus.user_id left join fantech_imes.smt_product_model spm on sm.product_model_id=spm.product_model_id left join fantech_imes.base_product_family bpf on spm.product_family_id = bpf.product_family_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON sm.organization_id = bo.organization_id
1=1
and date_format(sm.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and sm.material_code =#{materialCode}
and sm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and sm.material_name like CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
and sm.material_desc like CONCAT('%', #{materialDesc}, '%')
and sm.material_id!=(select material_id from fantech_imes.smt_product_bom where product_bom_id=#{productBomId})
and sm.material_id!=(select material_id from fantech_imes.smt_work_order where work_order_id=#{workOrderId})
and sm.status=#{status}
order by sm.create_time desc
